themes: lack of community representation on judging panels
judges' lack of understanding of the Austin Arts Community
perceived unfairness and illogical distribution of funds
lack of transparency in the funding process
ineligible or non-local groups receiving large grants
important local groups not receiving funding
key_phrases: better community representation on the judging panels
decisions should be made by people that understand the Austin Arts Community
some of the judges were not even reading the submissions
untested individuals and organizations received large grants
run by individuals that don't reside in Austin
many groups received no funding at all
funds to be fairly and logically distributed
barriers_identified: lack of community representation on panels
judges' lack of familiarity with local arts community
perceived bias or lack of diligence by judges
non-local or unqualified groups receiving funding
solutions_proposed: increase community representation on judging panels
ensure judges understand the Austin Arts Community
improve transparency in the funding process
